message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer gives us both a good chunk of money.
I understand you want a good chunk Alice, but so do I.  This is much fairer.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob, but it has to be reasonable. Time is running out!
Okay Alice, let's meet in the middle. This offer ensures we both benefit before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Bob, this is a fair offer and it benefits us both to take it before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
